name: Runaway Toy
description:
Runaway Toy Synopsis:

In Runaway Toy, you play as a doll who has come alive inside a toy doll workshop, a unique toy compared to the rest. 

After realizing your circumstance, you decide to escape the workshop, seeing life on a shelf as a less fulfilling path for a unique being like yourself. On your journey, you will traverse through objects, craft a bridge, and encounter enemies that delay you from reaching the exit. 

INSPIRE BY LITTLE BIG PLANET

Game Controls:

WASD for movement.

ESC to Pause.

Q to view map.

SPACEBAR to jump.

Group 2 Game Dev Team:

Assets: Teng Zhang, Julian Peralta, Marcus Sett, Dylan Ateba, Joshuah Shillingford

Art: Dylan Ateba, Joshuah Shillingford, Julian Peralta

Code/Mechanics: Teng Zhang, Julian Peralta, Marcus Sett

Level Design: Teng Zhang, Julian Peralta

Animation: Teng Zhang, Julian Peralta

UI: Julian Peralta
